roleset.name: alone
roleset.note: UNACCOMPANIED-J NOTES: Added automatically by Julia. Related to accompany (from unaccompanied.01-j)

example.name: unaccompanied-j
example.text: The Asylum Office should also confirm that the applicant was unaccompanied at the time of filing the Form I-589.
example.arg: at the time of filing the Form I-589

example.name: unaccompanied-j
example.text: The second type of earthquake associated with plate tectonics is [the shallow - focus event]-1 unaccompanied *-1 by volcanic activity .
